product_name: CamelBak Tycoon Hydration Snow Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak Tycoon(TM) hydration snow pack helps you stay hydrated in the lift-served backcountry of your local resort and features just the right amount of storage when hiking for your turns. CamelBak Tycoon carries skis diagonally or a snowboard vertically or horizontally. Main compartment holds backcountry must-haves as well as the small extras that keep you comfortable all day. Internal pockets organize backcountry cargo; pack easily carries probe, avalanche assessment equipment and other essentials. Drop-out probe pocket provides fast access to your probe in the event of an emergency; goggles pocket keeps your eyewear ready to shred. Padded waistbelt with convenience pocket supports a heavy load; harness optimizes fit and stability while you ski. Therminator(TM) harness features a pocket that's meant to store a handwarmer and prevent tube freeze-up; harness makes it easy to get to your mouthpiece. Camelbak has improved zipper placement to ease loading up the reservoir and to encourage frequent sipping. Improved reservoir features a lightweight fill port, a low-proflie design and a cap that opens and closes easily. HydroGuard(TM) technology inhibits bacterial growth on reservoir and tube surfaces (but does not protect user from disease organisms; please wash reservoir after each use). Delivery tube and bite valve run through the right shoulder strap to protect from freezing. Big Bite(TM) valve features a handy on/off switch.
short_description: The CamelBak Tycoon(TM) hydration snow pack helps you stay hydrated in the lift-served backcountry of your local resort and features just the right amount of storage when hiking for your turns.
